evidence.claim: California Health Information Association supports HIPAA compliance in their operations.
The organization's involvement with X12 indicates they handle EDI transactions as part of health information exchange.
They reference FHIR standards related to health information sharing.
HL7 standards are part of their data exchange protocols, essential for interoperability in healthcare.

icp.icp_reason: No relevant evidence of X12 transaction activities or clearinghouse functions found.
